text: 3.11 Hab 2.4, Lom 1.17, Gal 2.16, Hib 10.38 Pen takaw olap tɨkɨl agɨlak, Binɨb God nop gos lɨnepal okok nep nɨm, God nɨgek binɨb suŋtep ne okok mɨdtep yɨbɨl gɨnɨgabal agɨl tɨkɨlak. Anɨb ak chɨn nopun, binɨb Mosis takaw ak nep nɨŋɨd gel amnɨgab okok, binɨb suŋtep ne ma mɨdel, kɨlop dɨnɨmuŋ tek ma lɨnɨgab.
